title: jeeva muraLiyilE
sahitya:
jIva muraLiyilE dEvagAnam pozhivAi tEjOmayAnandanE anantanE



anupallavi



bhAvanArasamuDan bhakti paravashamum pADip-pADi teviTTAp-paNNamudum peruga  



caraNam



mannuyir vAzhvellAm innishaip-pozhilAgi mangaLak-kanivaLam

pongik-kulungiDavE

unnata jnAnattil Om shuddha shakti shivam oLira shuddhAnanda Utraruvi pozhiya
